snippet: The journey to this French-influenced spot takes you down an alley near the Forbidden City to a 600-year-old temple.
abstract: Cheryl Lu-Lien Tan reviews TRB, Temple Restaurant in Beijing, China.
lead_paragraph: The journey to this French-influenced spot takes you down an alley near the Forbidden City to a 600-year-old temple.

headline.seo: Restaurant Report: TRB, Temple Restaurant Beijing
